==Description==
The Captcha system was introduced around March 2022 in order to deter illegal [https://www.uoforever.com/rules.php Unattended Macroing] activity that has been defined in the [https://www.uoforever.com/rules.php Terms of Use(Rules)]. If actions that are being performed by a player meet the systems auto-detecting features, a "Captcha" menu will appear and the player will have 5 attempts within 5 minutes to answer the request. If you fail to provide an answer, the [[Skills|skill]] that triggered the "Captcha" will no longer be allowed to be used by this player for the next 4 hours. This will be indicated by a debuff incon that will appear on the debuff bar with the time remaining, along with message stating that you have failed and will be punished.

===Notes===
* [https://www.uoforum.com/threads/server-patch-notes-8-1-2-0.109999/ Patch Notes 8.1.2.0]
* Reduced the amount of random font colors allowed by the captcha script. Only the most visible colors should be drawn now.
* Added forgiveness. Occasionally you will be able to be forgiven by an accidently missing a captcha. Forgiveness is not granted very often, you should do your best to never use it, it is meant to help with emergency situations.
